heroSection.description: A modern and efficient tankless water heater installation, showcasing the company's expertise in providing reliable and energy-saving solutions for hot water needs.
heroSection.callToAction: Upgrade to a high-efficiency tankless water heater and save on your energy bills. Contact us today for a free consultation!

heroSection.description: A team of skilled professionals working on a sewer line repair project, demonstrating the company's commitment to addressing complex plumbing issues with precision and efficiency.
heroSection.callToAction: Experiencing sewer or drain problems? Our experts are equipped to handle any plumbing challenge. Schedule your service now!

heroSection.description: A well-branded service van, showcasing the company's professional image and readiness to serve residential and commercial clients with top-notch plumbing services.
heroSection.callToAction: Trust the experts at On Point Plumbing for all your plumbing needs. Call us today for prompt and reliable service!

aboutUsSection.description: A team member working on a new construction project, highlighting the company's capability to handle plumbing installations for residential and commercial buildings.
aboutUsSection.reasonForAboutUs: This image showcases the company's expertise in new construction projects, demonstrating their ability to handle plumbing installations from the ground up.

aboutUsSection.description: An exterior shot of a residential property, showcasing the company's commitment to serving homeowners with top-quality plumbing services.
aboutUsSection.reasonForAboutUs: This image represents the company's dedication to providing exceptional plumbing services to residential customers, fostering trust and reliability.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Danny Williamson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Came out sooner than he said, not only fixed the pipe but installed my bathroom vanity. Friendly,very reasonable.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.address: 61 Sterling Rd, Eastaboga, AL 36260, United States
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: On Point Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kyle Griffith
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Steven was great! I called him with a pinhole leak on some pec pipe and he was out the next day exactly when he said he would be. He even found a second leak and fixed that with no hesitation. I will be calling him with all my plumbing needs!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.address: 61 Sterling Rd, Eastaboga, AL 36260, United States
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: On Point Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Tim Rich
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I can't say enough good things about Scott's work.  He fixed several things my original plumber did wrong, half-did, or didn't do at all during my home's construction.  He diagnosed the problems, quickly identified the simplest and best solutions, and he did the work quickly and well.  He also re-plumbed my kitchen sink to accept a disposal and installed it.  He was responsive, on time, at all times professional, and his work was reasonably priced.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.address: 61 Sterling Rd, Eastaboga, AL 36260, United States
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: On Point Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: John Kabel
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Really one of the best plumbing contractors my company has ever worked with! We do construction all over state and use all sorts of plumbing contractors. plumberResearchFull.json:
### Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**:
  On Point Plumbing, LLC is registered in Alabama, with the registered agent listed as Steven S. Worthy. The business is located at 61 Sterling Road, Eastaboga, AL 36260[3].

- **Physical Location and Service Areas**:
  The physical location of On Point Plumbing is 61 Sterling Rd, Eastaboga, AL 36260. While the exact service areas are not explicitly stated, the business is known to serve customers in and around Eastaboga, and there are mentions of working on construction projects across the state[2][5].

- **Hours and Payment Methods**:
  On Point Plumbing operates from 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. from Monday to Friday and is closed on Saturdays and Sundays. The payment methods are not specified, but the business is described as having "very reasonable rates"[2][5].

- **Years in Operation**:
  The exact years in operation are not provided in the available sources, but the business has an established presence with multiple reviews and a strong customer base.

### Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**:
  On Point Plumbing is a full-service plumbing company that offers service calls, new residential and commercial construction, and various plumbing repairs. Services include fixing leaks, installing bathroom vanities, re-plumbing kitchen sinks, and installing disposals[2].

- **Service Areas Covered**:
  As mentioned, the business serves customers in and around Eastaboga and has been involved in construction projects across Alabama[2].

- **Emergency Service Availability**:
  While the sources do not explicitly mention emergency service availability, the business is praised for its prompt response and timely service, suggesting they may be available for urgent needs[2].

- **Any Listed Prices or Rates**:
  The sources do not provide specific prices or rates, but customers have noted that the business has "very reasonable rates"[2].

### Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**:
  On Point Plumbing has a 5-star rating with 27 reviews. Customers praise the business for its prompt service, professionalism, and reasonable prices. Examples include fixing a pinhole leak on PEC pipe, installing a bathroom vanity, and re-plumbing a kitchen sink. Customers also appreciate the friendly and helpful nature of the staff[2].

- **BBB Rating and Status**:
  There is no information available in the sources regarding a Better Business Bureau (BBB) rating or status.

- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**:
  Common themes include excellent customer service, professionalism, prompt response times, and reasonable prices[2].

- **Response to Reviews**:
  There is no information available on how the business responds to reviews, as the profile has not been claimed by the business owner or representative[2].

### Owner & Staff:

- **Owner/Management Information**:
  The registered agent and presumably an owner or key figure in the business is Steven S. Worthy. Additionally, there is mention of Scott, who is likely a key staff member or another owner, and Jessica, who is involved in customer service[2][3].

- **Staff Qualifications**:
  The sources do not provide detailed information on the staff's qualifications or professional certifications. However, customers have praised the staff's expertise and professionalism in their work[2].

- **Professional Certifications**:
  There is no specific information available on professional certifications held by the staff or owners of On Point Plumbing[2][3][5].
aboutUs: On Point Plumbing is a full-service plumbing company serving the Eastaboga area and beyond. Our team of skilled professionals specializes in residential and commercial plumbing services, from routine maintenance and repairs to new construction projects. With a focus on prompt, reliable service and a commitment to excellence, we are your go-to local experts for all your plumbing needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted local plumbing partner.
sellingPoints: Prompt response times and reliable service, ensuring your plumbing issues are resolved efficiently.
Expertise in a wide range of plumbing services, from leak detection and repair to fixture installation and system upgrades.
Commitment to using the latest techniques and high-quality materials, ensuring long-lasting solutions.
